title: 39 Ways to Save the Planet: #7 More Power from the Sun

sources.author: Science (American Association for the Advancement of Science)

cards.term: Briefly describe the new cells discussed in the programme.
cards.definition: Tandem solar cells that pair silicon with a metal halide perovskite are a promising option for surpassing the single-cell efficiency limit. We report a monolithic perovskite/silicon tandem with a certified power conversion efficiency of 29.15%.

multiplechoice.text: What type of energy do photons impart tp electrons when they strike them?

A good quality conventional solar panel produces 320watts; what can a perovskite-silicon panel produce?
A 2-junction, or perovskite-silicon tandem, cell would capture what percentage of sunlight?

unranked.text: Conventional solar panels capture approximately what percentage of the energy hitting them?

multipleselect.text: Dr. Edwards makes what forecast about standard photovoltaic cells by 2050?

multipleselect.text: Dr. Edwards makes what forecast about the most efficient perovskite-silicon cells by 2050?
